{
  "step_action": "check customer account balance",
  "step_action_completed": "The agent checked the customer's account balance",
  "children_conditions": [
    {
      "child_id": "3",
      "child_action": "offer discount if balance is low",
      "condition_to_child": "balance is low",
      "condition_to_child_and_stop": "The balance is low and the agent hasn't offered a discount yet",
      "conditions_to_child_and_forward": null
    }
  ]
